name: Crash Override
description:
Overview


Mow down hordes to power up and save the mainframe. Survive a run to save the core, or derezz while trying, and then rezz again. Match weapons and upgrades to create an overpowered build. Move quickly to stay ahead of the crash wave. Collect data before it's lost forever.

Play Crash Override as one of 6 avatars against a horde of viral glitches. Explore the cybernet with its 2D monochrome 80s CRT visual style and driving retro synthwave soundtrack.

Current Features




Weapons - 12 weapon programs to collect - choose which to load and what to leave.



Enemy Onslaught - Shoot, dash, and maneuver to take down hordes of enemy glitches (27+ different enemy types).



Power Ups - Wide variety of weapon, health and power upgrades.



Become Overpowered - Collect enough weapons and upgrades to demolish any opposition.



Choose Your Path - Race ahead of the crash wave - choose from infinitely branching paths.



Twitch Voting Mode - Help chat participate when streaming on the Twitch platform.



Speed Run Mode - Endless variety of single path courses to test your mastery - challenge others to the same course to see who can get the best time.



Estimated play time per run: 20-40 minutes

Liberate CPU fragments from glitches in the mainframe. The more CPU fragments collected the faster your avatar becomes, and with enough CPU, the location of the virus is decoded.

Reach CPU level 100+ to unlock the location of the virus.

RAM fragments can be collected. RAM provides storage for new weapon and upgrade programs.

Data fragments can be found. Data provides keys to unlock doors and access to locked caches.

New features and content added this week. See Roadmap below.
